segments.text: I’m shocked by how much water is pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s a tightrope act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the girl is just waiting for a cookie without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a slow-motion disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and no one is doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed the woman hasn’t noticed the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to get away with it unless someone stops them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the most surprising things I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
